1.speaker: Resources/dialogitems/face.png
1.text:
MAYDAY, MAYDAY! Commander P. Ug speaking!
Does any- *zrkkk* -one hear *zrrk* me?
PLEASE *zrrrkkk* HELP *zrrk*

1.speaker: Resources/dialogitems/face.png
1.text:
HAHAHA! YOU THINK YOU CAN STOP ME!
I'm the Trumpinator!
I will destroy you like a mexican god!
Here, have a little taste of my army!
